hero.title: The React hook Library
hero.description: Raddix is a collection of hooks and utilities for React

accessible.subtitle: Accessibility out of the box
accessible.description: Raddix helps you build accessible components, including full screen reader and keyboard navigation support.

dataCard.title: Keyboard navigation
dataCard.description: Full keyboard support, allowing faster navigation without lifting your hands from the keyboard.

dataCard.title: Focus indicator
dataCard.description: Raddix provides focus accessibility so you can identify the elements you are interacting with.

dataCard.title: Screen reader
dataCard.description: Raddix has been tested with major screen readers such as NVDA, JAWS, and TalkBack.

styling.subtitle: Compatible with any styling solution
styling.description: You have complete control over how you styling and structure your components.
